text: Allahe ka’ba, ‘tomalokara agata yibora jbina arau manaradala para haiche sihamtara lagata tomaloke'o ju'ita praraesa karaa’. Yetiya'i kono dala tata praraesa karaiba tetiya'i ana dalaka sihamte abhisampata karaiba. Arasesata yetiya sihamta sakalorae tata ekatraita ha’ba, tetiya sihamtara parabartisakale purbarartisakalara bisaye ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Ihamte'i amaka bibhraanta karaichila; seye ihamtaka dbiguna ju'ira sasti diya’. Allahe ka’ba, ‘pratyekarae babe ache dbiguna sasti kintu tomaloke najana’
